snippet: Citing concerns over security and overcrowding, London officials rejected Russia’s proposals to turn Marble Arch into a party site during next year’s London Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Citing concerns over security and overcrowding, London officials rejected Russia’s proposals to turn Marble Arch into a party site during next year’s London Olympics.

headline.main: No Russian Party at London Games
headline.print_headline: No Russian Party at London Games
headline.seo: No Russian Party at London Games
